text: Bigu: «Ojo ʙa cuz Allohi mutaol parvardigorero ʙicuem va hol on ki U Parvardigori hama ciz ast? Va hec kase [kori nosoistae] ancom namedihad, magar on ki [ʙori gunohas] ʙar xudi ust va hec gunahgore ʙori [gunohi] digarero ʙa dus namekasad. Sipas ʙozgasti [hamai] sumo ʙa suji Parvardigoraton ast. On goh [dar ruzi qijomat, az haqiqati] on ci dar on ixtilof dosted, ogohaton mesozad
